rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance towards the auspicious east or north direction. The lobby serves as a transitional area before entering the main living spaces.

layout.description: The ground floor is designed to maximize natural light and ventilation while incorporating modern aesthetics with open spaces that provide a seamless flow between living areas and service zones. Structural elements are placed in accordance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines, ensuring stability on the irregular plot. The layout includes designated zones for guest use and utility services.

special_features.name: Built-in Storage
special_features.description: Efficient storage solutions integrated into the lobby area to reduce clutter while maintaining a modern look.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Vastu recommendations are followed by orienting the bed towards the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable second bedroom designed to ensure privacy and optimal light exposure.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom catering to guest use or a home office setup. The room is oriented according to Vastu principles ensuring calm and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for guests with modern fixtures.

layout.description: The first floor prioritizes privacy and comfort with dedicated sleeping areas that adhere to Vastu guidelines. Natural light is maximized through strategically placed windows and a balcony access door for the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A modern outdoor living space with seating areas, greenery, and water features. Designed to offer a panoramic view of the surroundings while ensuring privacy.

layout.description: The rooftop terrace is integrated with sustainable design elements such as solar panels and rainwater harvesting systems. It features a blend of modern aesthetics and traditional Vastu principles by aligning relaxation spaces in the northeast direction.
